issue.title: [Python] Rename all Cython extensions to "private" status with leading underscore
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-751](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-751). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can do this after the dust settles with the in-flight patches, but it would be good to have `pyarrow._array` instead of `pyarrow.array`. If we need to expose a module "publicly" to the user, it would be better to do it in pure Python (as we've done already with `pyarrow._parquet`).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-751?focusedCommentId=15967402) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 533
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/533>
